content.text: is designed to generate a report of monthly energy data for agencies, categorized by energy type. It retrieves and formats energy usage and cost data for a specified billing period and agency, and logs the report usage. The procedure supports different types of energy metrics, such as usage in kWh, therms, or costs in dollars, and can be tailored for agency users.

The procedure involves multiple conditional logic branches, dynamic data aggregation, and formatting operations. It also includes a nested subquery structure and joins, which add to its complexity. However, it does not involve highly complex algorithms or recursive logic, placing it at a medium complexity level.
: The email address of the user requesting the report, used for logging purposes.
: The billing period for which the report is generated, formatted as a string (e.g., '202301').
: The agency code(s) for which the report is generated, potentially allowing multiple codes.
: Specifies the type of energy data to report, such as 'Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Usage (kWh)', etc.
: A flag indicating whether the user is an agency user, which affects how the billing period is determined.
: Sets the transaction isolation level to
to avoid locking issues and initializes local variables.
: If the user is an agency user, the procedure retrieves the current processing period from the
, to log the report request details.
and adjusts it for fiscal year calculations.
A subquery aggregates energy data from the
The data is filtered based on the effective period and energy type.
Energy data is converted to BTU if specified, using conversion factors.
The outer query formats the aggregated data for each month and the year-to-date total, applying currency or numeric formatting based on the
: The final result set is ordered by fiscal year and agency code.
can improve performance by reducing locking but may lead to reading uncommitted data.
for month extraction could be optimized if the billing period format changes.
statements for data conversion and formatting may impact performance, especially with large datasets.
and grouping operations could be performance bottlenecks if the underlying tables are large or not indexed appropriately.
isolation level risks reading dirty data, which could lead to inaccurate reports.
may lead to inefficient memory usage if not needed.
: Hardcoded conversion factors for BTU calculations may need updates if energy conversion standards change.
: The procedure's performance may degrade with increasing data volume, especially if the underlying tables grow significantly.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions and incomplete operations.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_MonthlyAgencyDataByEnergyType]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(MAX)
	,@Type AS VARCHAR(50)
	,@IsAgencyUser AS BIT = 0
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID), @BillingPeriodMonth AS INT;

	IF (@IsAgencyUser = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod = PublishedBillingPeriod FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';
	END;

	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName	= @spname,
		@StoredProcName	= @spname,
		@RequestedBy = @EmailAddress,
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		@prmBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies = @AgencyCodeOEC,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s = NULL,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod = NULL;

	SET @BillingPeriodMonth = CAST(SUBSTRING(@PublishedBillingPeriod, 4, 6) AS INT);
	SET @BillingPeriodMonth = CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth <= 6 THEN @BillingPeriodMonth + 12 ELSE @BillingPeriodMonth END;
	
	SELECT O.EnergyType,
        O.PublishedBillingPeriod,
        O.AgencyCodeOEC,
        O.AgencyName,
        O.FiscalYear,
        CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.YearToDate, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.YearToDate, 'N2') END AS YearToDate,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.July, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.July, 'N2') END July,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.August, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.August, 'N2') END AS August,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.September, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.September, 'N2') END AS September,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.October, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.October, 'N2') END AS October,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.November, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.November, 'N2') END AS November,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.December, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.December, 'N2') END AS December,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.January, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.January, 'N2') END AS January,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.February, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.February, 'N2') END AS February,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.March, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.March, 'N2') END AS March,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.April, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.April, 'N2') END AS April,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.May, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.May, 'N2') END AS May,
		CASE WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN FORMAT(O.June, 'C')
			ELSE FORMAT(O.June, 'N2') END AS June
	FROM (SELECT @Type AS EnergyType
			,R.PublishedBillingPeriod
			,R.AgencyCodeOEC
			,R.AgencyName
			,R.FiscalYear
			,CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 7 THEN ISNULL(R.July, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 8 THEN ISNULL(R.August, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 9 THEN ISNULL(R.September, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 10 THEN ISNULL(R.October, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 11 THEN ISNULL(R.November, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 12 THEN ISNULL(R.December, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 13 THEN ISNULL(R.January, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 14 THEN ISNULL(R.February, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 15 THEN ISNULL(R.March, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 16 THEN ISNULL(R.April, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 17 THEN ISNULL(R.May, 0) ELSE 0 END
				+ CASE WHEN @BillingPeriodMonth >= 18 THEN ISNULL(R.June, 0) ELSE 0 END AS YearToDate
			,R.July
			,R.August
			,R.September
			,R.October
			,R.November
			,R.December
			,R.January
			,R.February
			,R.March
			,R.April
			,R.May
			,R.June
		FROM (SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod AS PublishedBillingPeriod, 
				FYPivot.AgencyCodeOEC, 
				FYPivot.AgencyName, 
				FYPivot.FiscalYear, 
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.JulyRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.JulyRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.JulyRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.JulyRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JulyRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.JulyRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JulyRevisedBilledDollars) END AS July,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.AugustRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.AugustRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.AugustRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.AugustRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.AugustRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.AugustRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.AugustRevisedBilledDollars) END AS August,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.SeptemberRevisedBilledDollars) END AS September,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.OctoberRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.OctoberRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.OctoberRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.OctoberRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.OctoberRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.OctoberRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.OctoberRevisedBilledDollars) END AS October,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.NovemberRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.NovemberRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.NovemberRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.NovemberRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.NovemberRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.NovemberRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.NovemberRevisedBilledDollars) END AS November,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.DecemberRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.DecemberRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.DecemberRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.DecemberRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.DecemberRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.DecemberRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.DecemberRevisedBilledDollars) END AS December,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JanuaryRevisedBilledDollars) END AS January,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.FebruaryRevisedBilledDollars) END AS February,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.MarchRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.MarchRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.MarchRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.MarchRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.MarchRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.MarchRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.MarchRevisedBilledDollars) END AS March,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.AprilRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.AprilRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.AprilRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.AprilRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.AprilRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.AprilRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.AprilRevisedBilledDollars) END AS April, 
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.MayRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.MayRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.MayRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.MayRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.MayRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.MayRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.MayRevisedBilledDollars) END AS May,
				CASE WHEN @Type = 'BTU' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM' THEN FYPivot.JuneRevisedEnergy * 1.11718000
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS' THEN FYPivot.JuneRevisedEnergy * 0.1
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE' THEN FYPivot.JuneRevisedEnergy * 0.00341297
						WHEN FYPivot.EnergyType = 'CHW' THEN FYPivot.JuneRevisedEnergy * 0.0223436 END)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)','Gas (Therms)', 'Steam (MLbs)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JuneRevisedEnergy)
					WHEN @Type = 'Electricity Demand (kW)' THEN SUM(FYPivot.JuneRevisedDemand)
					WHEN @Type IN ('Total Cost ($)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Gas Cost ($)', 'Steam Cost ($)') THEN SUM(FYPivot.JuneRevisedBilledDollars) END AS June
			FROM Published.TemporalFiscalYearPivotByAgencyFacilityAndAccountDollarsAndUsage AS FYPivot
				INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCodeOEC, @EmailAddress) AS A ON FYPivot.AgencyCodeOEC = A.AgencyCodeOEC
			WHERE FYPivot.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND FYPivot.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod
				AND ((@Type IN ('Electricity Usage (kWh)', 'Electricity Cost ($)', 'Electricity Demand (kW)') AND FYPivot.EnergyType = 'ELE')
					OR (@Type IN ('Gas (Therms)', 'Gas Cost ($)') AND FYPivot.EnergyType = 'GAS')
					OR (@Type IN ('Steam (MLbs)', 'Steam Cost ($)') AND FYPivot.EnergyType = 'STM')
					OR (@Type IN ('BTU', 'Total Cost ($)')))
			GROUP BY FYPivot.AgencyCodeOEC, FYPivot.AgencyName, FYPivot.FiscalYear) AS R) AS O
	ORDER BY O.FiscalYear DESC, O.AgencyCodeOEC;
END;
